img.alt: Work With Us Become a member of our team. Careers at Boston Prep
Work With Us Become a member of our team. Careers at Boston Prep

div.p: Become a member of our team.

div.h1:
Boston Prep prepares students to succeed in four-year colleges and embody, in thought and action, lifelong ethical growth.
100% of our graduates are accepted to college, and we're working hard to ensure they graduate.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.h2: Choosing Resilience: An Alumnusâs Reflections on the First Semester of College
div.p: Itâs 10:05 AM on a Tuesday. Iâm a freshman at Bowdoin College, and Iâm sitting in my first-year seminar, Dystopias of America. As the professor reviews the syllabus, I learn that we will be reading a novel every week, with an essay to be completed every weekend. I reread the syllabus to make sure Iâve heard correctly.

Every person has a phoenix within them. Everyone has the ability to conquer any challenge. Itâs about the place and people around you who can nurture that inner phoenix. At Boston Prep, we will never give up.

div.p: From the family handbook to student travel informationÂ and SchoolBrains login, our Family Resource Center has everything our families need in one location.
